I usually wear a small at 5’3“, 125 lbs 28“ waist. After reading reviews, ordered up, a medium, instead of small. Pants fit perfectly. Cardigan runs true to size. Pants do not.

评论概述: Bad dupe for the free people set
评论详情: I purchased this exact same set in a different color from free people and it fit great, I am usually a XXL in pants but can always get away with an XL in sweats and leggings, in the FP set I have an XL so I figured same size from this Amazon set would fit the same. Boy was I wrong! It was much tighter at the waist tho not unbearable, equally loose around the legs and so. Reason I give it such a low rating it’s because by the end of the day when I took the pants off the seam had come apart in the crotch area! So now because I used them for a day I cannot return them, but this for me was wasted money, very much rather pay three times the price to get a high quality set. Unfortunately, I would not recommend.

I am 5'9, about 143lb and ordered a M. Length is perfect which was my main concern. The feel and look of the fabric is really good. Very comfy and perfect for the fall/winter in California.

Super cute and comfy and it is by far my favorite set that I've ordered. I will be ordering additional colors. It's a great set to run errands in on the weekend or just relax at home in. Pants are perfect length and runs true to size, the top is a little roomy but made that way. Order it, you won't regret it!
Pleasantly surprised by how comfortable this set is. The quality is great. Will be lounging in style this season.
I love this set and wear it often! The material is so soft and it washes really well. Fits true to size.

This set exceeded my expectations.  I ordered the black in small (5'5" 110 lbs) and it fit perfect.  The pants are very slimming and love the oversized fit of the sweater.  I will also be able to split the set and wear the sweater and bottom with lots of other things.  Very very comfy!  I'm going to otder other colors.

Want to brighten up your loungewear wardrobe? You should try this two piece set. I bought it in two colors. I love it. I ordered the size small and it fits perfectly. They wash up really nice. Super cute and comfy set. The color was nice as well. Fabric is nice, not too heavy or light. Very soft. Great for these fall days.
Color was called apricot,  it was a true cream/beige 5
I bought these thinking they would be comfortable after I had a surgery. I have loved them so much. I’m still wearing them. People often comment how cute it is.

Love Love Love this set - purchased apricot and dusty blue and both are exactly as pictured. These wash and wear very well, maintaining their shape without stretching out at all. I cannot love this more. The PERFECT set for days when both style and comfort are essential

The quality is good for the price. The material is thick and feels expensive. I really like the top and wear it separately sometimes with jeans. The pants are truly giving nothing for the shape. Material and color look very cheap.

I really like this. It is soft and warm. It is nice enough so if you have to run out it looks good. I will wear the sweater separately also. It was a good choice. I am going on a road trip and I plan on wearing it in the car. I will feel very comfortable wearing it into a restaurant.

Fit perfect in my normal size unless you like really baggy then size up.I wore it out like an outfit. Put a lace tank under the sweater unbuttoned the 2 top buttons and wore it out Shopping and came home took off my shoes and lounged around. Going to buy another one.
I love this! I’m 5ft 1 and this fits perfectly! I couldn’t love it more! I went back and bought more colors. I’m wearing a small for reference.

True to size (pants can shrink a little and stop at ankle) and thick material. Washes well, try to hang dry to preserve. Great for post partum, hides milk/spit up without damaging fabric. Can button over nursing bra and have company over without being too low cut.  Bought in two colors because I liked it so much.

Cannot recommend this set enough!! It’s so soft and comfortable! The material is so soft and not itchy at all. The colors are so pretty and true to listing. The quality for the price is amazing! Only down fall is there’s no pockets but I don’t mind. It’s not heavy but not lightweight either it’s just right! It says dry clean only but I’ve gotten by with washing cold on delicate and hanging to dry.

I am 5’ 2’’ 123 pounds., 36 c/d and over 50 - the medium fit well and was not dragging on the ground. The fabric is not itchy; I am very sensitive to fabrics and would prefer if this was 100 percent cotton, but the blend is okay and doesnt bother my skin. I bought this for air travel and relaxing and it will look fine for both.
Very comfortable! Got it as a 9 months pregnant woman and the medium works perfectly. The quality feels excellent!
So cozy and cute!!! I’ve gotten so many compliments! Very flattering and versatile !!!

评论概述: love the quality and feel on my skin!

I saw something like this on TikTok and FB reels.  I bought it hoping it was as comfy as all the women were making it out to be and I'm so happy that it is!!! I love this set and would buy more colors if it was more affordable.

评论概述: Well made, pant fit is off
评论详情: This set is beautiful and well made. The color is as advertised. The material is thick and is warm. However, the crotch area is not flattering and awkward. I think it's because the waist is high cut, so there is extra material. For reference I am 5'7", 128lbs and normally wear a size 4 in jeans. If the crotch was a better fit I would have kept the set because it's really nice. I got a size small and the fit was good other than the crotch. Sadly I will be returning it.
There was no structure at all to this set… Just was not flattering, and the apricot color washes out the skin if you are fair

I really like the pants to this outfit but wish the sweater was shorter and more fitted. When you are short and petite a cardigan sweater that hits below the waist can look frumpy. I wear a size 6 and bought a size medium and I’m glad I did. I find that many of Amazons clothing runs small / tight compared to department or specialty lines of clothing.

I am 5'5", 155 lbs. and a 34 DDD and the large fits me great.  The size chart is accurate and it looks exactly like the picture.  I made my decision based on the waist measurement.  The care label says to hand wash but I decided to wash it in my machine on the hand wash setting, through it in the dryer on the lowest setting for about 5 minutes and then removed it to air dry and it came out perfectly and with no shrinkage.  The material has a soft feel and has a great drape to it.  LOVE this and I thank IG influencer, @justclassicallycassidy for this one!
Sad to say as soon as I took out packaging the threading fell apart on the pants. Not wearable and very expensive for the low quaility

评论概述: Looks cute but the quality is ok

I liked the fit. It seemed true to size. I’m 5’9 & would have been okay if the inseam was longer. My disappointment is in the texture of the fabric. I wore it on a 75ish degree day and it was hot! Felt like the material just didn’t breathe.

评论概述: Nice copy of a more expensive variety.

Great fabric , nice lounging outfit.
Overall, very happy with this set, medium material soft but pants are too short. I ordered a small and am 5’ 8 “.need to size up to a medium so returning for medium.

评论概述: Flattering, comfortable, oh so cozy loungewear set!
评论详情: I purchased this coordinating cozy loungewear set in the taupe/brown color, and it has quickly become my go-to for lounging at home and traveling in style! The fabric is incredibly soft and comfortabley, making it feel like I’m wearing the lightest, coziest blanket. The high-waisted pants offer a slimming, flattering fit. The set as a whole feels effortlessly chic.  The real standout for me is the cardigan. It doubles as a cozy grandpa sweater that I’ve found myself throwing on with other outfits—it’s just that versatile! Whether I'm curled up on the couch or catching a flight, this set is stylish, modern, and right on-trend. Ideal for anyone looking for something comfortable but still pulled-together.
Perfect for fall

评论概述: Very Happy with this two piece sweater set, Free People Dupe
评论详情: Free people sweater Dupe, Free People $138, Amazon $39.99 when using sale day!  Winning.  This sweater set is a tad lighter weight than FP but that didn’t disappoint me at all.  Buttons were different and more of a shell appearance.  Overall excellent quality.  Fit is nice. Sizing is accurate.  I went up a size because reviews stated pants ran slim.  I could have stayed with my size.  I am 5’4” weigh 175lbs.  This is xl.  Will purchase the khaki in a large.  I’m gifting the black to my daughter.  These are a great staple this winter.

I was skeptical whether this was a true dupe for the $128 FP set…well, IT IS. Far exceeded my expectations. Soft, comfortable, effortless style. I took my savings and bought multiple sets in different colors. I’m so glad I did!

评论概述: If you are looking for comfy cozy!
评论详情: This FP dupe is so comfy cozy while still looking put together. I wore ot to a quiet day at the office and I was so comfortable. Now I'm laying on the couch and it's checking all the cozy boxes. I highly recommend! 🥰🎃🪷  1. Appearance - put together and coastal grandma. Plenty of room in a size medium 2. Size- I am 5ft tall amd around 109 pounds. Tiny frame. 26 yo 27 inch waist. I opted for a size medium and I'm thrilled I went up. Perfectly cozy. 2. Color - perfecty clean beige 3. Shrinkage - not sure yet 4. Versatility- I can wear it at home, running errands and to a casual office day. 5. Value - the best!
This matching set is adorable & great quality! I want to buy more colors!!

I am always hesitant to buy certain styles off Amazon, sometimes the “dupes” really look like cheap knockoffs, but this is almost better. It looks like good quality, and really does feel like a sweater. I am 5’6 165lbs that carries a lot of weight in belly area the pants fit perfect the top was a little big. Everyone is different but I’d say it is pretty true to size cause I usually get a XL and that’s the size I bought and I am happy with it. Can’t wait for the fall to wear this the fabric is perfect for those cooler fall days but wear it separate for those warmer days.

The apricot is more of a light tan, not the off white it appears in the photo. I wish Amazon could align their colors more accurately. It is incredibly soft and warmer than I thought it would be. Good for Georgia fall and winter. I purchased the large and I'm 5'10, 160. It's perfectly oversized. The sleeves are plenty long and the pants are just long enough. I haven't worn for an entire day but do see the fabric potentially loosening throughout the day as others mentioned. I purchased with a discount and went back to get another one but no other colors are discounted, more Amazon frustration.

Finally found what I was looking for. I like that this set has cotton in it. I would as others have said to make top longer by a couple inches but keep oversized style i will have to wear a shirt underneath for coverage:-(. The length was good I'm 5'4" . I got the stripe/nutmeg very beautiful color. I will order more for fall and winter.

Wow! I’m stunned at how flattering this is and beautiful it fits. The material and weight is perfect and the quality exceeded my expectations.

Absolutely love this set! It is stretchy, comfortable and stylish. I ended up buying in three different colors. It’s thick so it’s warm but also the material fits loose so it keeps your temperature regulated nicely. The set is a great deal!
Great quality and comfortable, fit tts, and is warm and super cute! Will be one of my go to fall looks!

I purchased black XL which fits good only a little tighter in waist then would have liked. I’m 5.5 weighing 195 with weight distributed evenly so my rear, stomach and bust are pretty even. I like the quality it’s not to thin or to thick and I like the waffle pattern on the pants.

LOVE this set. True to size. Comfortable and good quality for price. Recommend!

评论概述: Could smell the scented laundry detergent before I opened the package
评论详情: Item was purchased new. It was obviously worn, washed with smelly laundry detergent, sporting a stain and lint, and haphazardly stuffed in a plastic bag. I won’t know, because I’m returning it ASAP.
Wanted something stylish yet comfortable for a long plane flight.  With some good jewelry and shoes it fits the bill.
Love this outfit comfy and the quality is there
this is a great sweater set, can be worn together or separate. it is soft and comfortable and looks great. It's a finer knit which looks very good.
The material is not soft as advertised and not very nice looking. I washed the outfit, followed the instructions and the waistband is coming apart from the pants.  Don’t waste your money!
Really cozy for those chilly days. Sweater is very cute and pants are just the right length and I'm 5'5". Buy this product before its gone!!!
This is the best lounge wear set!!!
Great material and very comfortable

Fabric is soft and lightweight, has a little more shine to it than I’d hoped, but better than other brands I’ve tried here. Top is oversized, which is fine — but not in length. I’d originally ordered a medium (my true size) and decided I wanted it less fitted and ordered a large. With a 29” waist (without being squeezed) the large fits perfectly. The medium fit but because the legs are narrower than they show in the pic, I didn’t like that fit. The large aren’t much roomier, maybe 1/2” added. I’m 5’6” and the medium was shorter than I wanted. I wish they would balloon the leg cut a little bit, to match the photo (and no, it’s not bc the model has skinny legs) But overall, it’s cute enough to keep. If you’re bigger on top than bottom, it will fit you better.

评论概述: Cute lounge wear and very stylish but comfortable.
评论详情: Looks cute nice to wear when I’m lounging around staying in . If someone drop by I don’t have to run put something on I’m good in this it’s cute and comfortable so it absolutely fits what I was looking for . It’s the whole reason for buying it
Although this is a loose fit it was huge, especially the pants. Returned.

评论概述: LOVE THESE SO MUCH I BOUGHT 2

And the black one is a size M and just fits me a little better without getting too baggy.  I might even order another colour.

Super comfortable but be aware that the high waisted pants are REALLY high waisted. I mean really. The top seam could practically act as a bra. The legs are also long (for this 5'4" person) so I had to hem them which took away the nice tapering.

This is my new favorite! I was not feeling well, having tummy issues, but needed to go to work because it was the Friday before a holiday. I did not know what to put on and was feeling a little bloated. I had washed this set, so it was hanging in the closet. I put it on with some Uggs and went to work. I looked good and felt comfortable.  The set is well made. The seams are finished. The length is good for tall women and the crotch did not bag. The fit is not too baggy. I did not need to size up. I had to stop myself from reaching to get it this past Friday.
Not worth the price at all.  Total ripoff
The sweater runs big on top. Ordered a small. Sweater top was like a large.

I love any lounge set thee multi use! You can pair this button up too with jeans, and the pants with a graphic T for a relaxed look. This set fits good, is verrry comfortable and makes you look put together, even if it feels like lounge ware. I recommend one of these sets for your wardrobe...so versatile!

This matching pair is made of a good quality material. It has thickness to it, I got a bigger size for the oversized look and it does quit that.  You don't need any additional layers either, which is a plus! You can fully enjoy the feeling or relaxation!

I bought this to wear on a 12 hour flight.  It came in the mail today and is super nice.I'm 5'6" and about a women's size 8 and the small fits really perfectly.  It's not super oversized but isn't tight at all either.
product was as advertized

I love this lounge outfit. It fit well. It's not too hot, the fabric is nice and soft, it launders well, I'm 5 foot tall and it goes all the way to my ankles but is still flattering. I might have to get a couple more.
It’s cute but if you get the cream colored one it’s see through and very thin

This is very comfortable, it looks good, the fabric is high quality, and the construction is nice. It would be perfect if the pants had pockets, but otherwise it's great. It seems to be true to size as well.
